page.title: 16LADYMOUNT SCHOOL CONT
page.content: We have a very small class of 21 children. There are 4 boys and 14 girls. The Lower Juniors have games on a Thursday afternoon and the Upper Juniors on a Friday afternoon. We play netball and football in the winter and cricket rounders and tennis in the Summer. We are very lucky as we have a large tarmac playground and a big field to play on. At lunch times some children bring sandwiches to eat and others buy their lunch at the cash cafeteria which is served by the kitchen staff and the dinner ladies. Andrea Hawker.11.
